resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104957</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Child Labor in America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinderarbeit in Amerika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Travail des enfants en Amérique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalho de criança em América</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lavoro del bambino in America</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιδική εργασία στην Αμερική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajo de niño en América</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a teaching unit that leads middle and high school students through the process of critically examining photographs (by Lewis Hine) as historical evidence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eine ist das Unterrichten Maßeinheit, die 
mittlere und High School Kursteilnehmer durch den Prozeß von 
Fotographien kritisch überprüfen (durch Lewis Hine) als historischer
Beweis führt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une unité l'enseignement qui mène des 
étudiants de lycée moyen et par le processus d'examiner en critique 
des photographies (par Lewis Hine) en tant qu'évidence historique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma unidade ensinar que conduza a estudantes da
High School média e com o processo crìticamente de examinar 
fotografias (por Lewis Hine) como a evidência histórica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un'unità insegnare che conduce gli allievi 
della High School centrale e con il processo criticamente di esaminare
le fotografie (da Lewis Hine) come prova storica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια μονάδα διδασκαλίας που οδηγεί τους 
σπουδαστές μεσών και γυμνασίου μέσω της διαδικασίας αυστηρά τις 
φωτογραφίες (από Lewis Hine) ως ιστορικά στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una unidad la enseñanza que conduce a 
estudiantes de la High School media y secundaria con el proceso 
críticamente de examinar las fotografías (por Lewis Hine) como 
evidencia histórica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104957</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/child-labor-in-america</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
